RahulShettyAcademyPracticePagePage.description: This page provides a variety of interactive elements for practicing UI automation, including radio buttons, dropdowns, checkboxes, input fields, tables, and window/tab handling.

AutomationPracticePage.description: This page is designed to provide a variety of interactive elements for practicing and testing automation scripts. It includes examples of radio buttons, suggestion classes, dropdowns, checkboxes, window/tab switching, alerts, and web tables.

elements.name: Radio Button 1
elements.description: The first radio button option.

elements.name: Suggestion Class Input
elements.description: Input field for suggestion class example.

elements.name: Dropdown Select
elements.description: Dropdown element for selecting an option.

elements.description: The first checkbox option.

elements.name: Open Window Button
elements.description: Button to open a new window.

elements.name: Open Tab Button
elements.description: Button to open a new tab.

elements.name: Alert Input
elements.description: Input field for the alert example.

elements.name: Alert Button
elements.description: Button to trigger an alert.

elements.name: Confirm Button
elements.description: Button to trigger a confirmation dialog.

elements.name: Hide Button
elements.description: Button to hide the displayed element.

elements.description: Textbox that can be hidden or shown.
